titleStmt.title: Duplys for the Laird of Seualtoun, and others the late magistrats of the burgh of Irwine, to the replys given in by the present magistrats against them
titleStmt.author: Wallace, William, fl. 1689?

notesStmt.note: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 ascribes this item to William Wallace.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
